price: Foi-Ihe dito: "Entra no Paraíso." Ele disse: "Quem dera meu povo soubesse!"
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
